label: Archival Service
definition: A gRPC API layer that exposes access to this store.

label: Archival Store
definition: A long-term storage system that holds checkpoint-indexed Sui data.

label: Causal history
definition: The relationship between an object in Sui and its direct predecessors and successors.

label: Causal order
definition: A representation of the relationship between transactions and the objects they produce.

label: Certificate
definition: The mechanism proving a transaction was approved or certified.

label: Closed-Loop Token
definition: A token that can be used only for a specific service or authorized account.

label: DeepBook
definition: A decentralized central limit order book (CLOB) built on Sui.

label: Devnet
definition: For developing and testing new features.

label: Epoch
definition: A period of time defined by the network.

label: Equivocation
definition: When an owned object pair is used concurrently in multiple non-finalized transactions.

label: Finality
definition: The state in which a transaction is permanently recorded and cannot be revoked.

label: Gas
definition: The computational cost of execution and object storage for a transaction.

label: Localnet
definition: Local network you can run on your own machine for optimized development.

label: Kiosk
definition: A decentralized system for commerce applications on Sui.

label: Mainnet
definition: Production network for live transactions and real-value assets.

label: Multi-writer objects
definition: Objects that are owned by more than one address.

label: Mysticeti
definition: The consensus protocol used on Sui.

label: Object
definition: The basic unit of storage on Sui.

label: Operation Cap
definition: Allows a validator to authorize another account to perform certain actions on its behalf.

label: Single-writer objects
definition: Objects owned by one address.

label: Soulbound
definition: An asset that is bound to an account and cannot be transferred.

label: Testnet
definition: Staging network for testing changes before production deployment.

label: Transaction
definition: A number of commands that execute on inputs to define the result of the transaction.

label: Transfer
definition: Changing the owner of an asset.

label: Validator
definition: Responsible for executing tasks like staking, gas price references, and tallying rules.

label: Wallet Standard
definition: A cross-chain standard that defines how apps can interact with wallets.

label: Consensus
definition: The process by which the majority of nodes agree on the current state of the network

label: Full node
definition: Responsible for validating blockchain activity.

label: DPoS
definition: Consensus mechanism used by Sui.

label: Programmable transaction blocks
definition: Define all user transactions on Sui.

label: System transactions
definition: Only submittable by validator nodes.

label: MIST
definition: The smallest unit of SUI.

label: Move
definition: An open source programming language used for all activity on Sui.

label: Quorum
definition: A set of validators whose combined voting power is greater than 2/3 of the total.

label: Sponsored transaction
definition: When one address pays the gas fee for a transaction submitted by another address.

label: Multisig
definition: Multi-signature transactions that require multiple keys for authorization.

label: gRPC API
definition: Replaces JSON-RPC on full nodes for data access.

label: General-purpose Indexer
definition: A performant and scalable implementation of the custom indexing framework.

label: GraphQL RPC
definition: A lightweight GraphQL RPC service.

label: zkLogin
definition: A Sui primitive that allows you to send transactions using an OAuth credential.

label: Checkpoint
definition: Created after transaction execution to provide a certified record of chain history.

label: Address
definition: A unique, anonymous identity on a blockchain network.

label: Faucet
definition: A service that provides free Testnet tokens.

label: Package
definition: Smart contracts on Sui.

label: Module
definition: A component of a Move package that defines interaction with on-chain objects.

label: Nautilus
definition: Secure and verifiable off-chain computation on Sui.
